about.subtitle: About Us
about.title: The New Standard of Cleanliness
about.mission_description: With over 25 years of experience in various sectors, since 2023 we have also been operating under the name AzTurk LLC in the field of cleaning and disposable packaging. As the importer of many well-known brands in Azerbaijan, our company operates based on the principle that 'Quality Comes First.' Our mission is to provide eco-friendly, professional, and high-quality products for hotels, restaurants, catering services, and other sectors that use cleaning and disposable packaging products. Along with the HoReCa segment, we also offer quality products at affordable prices for offices, companies, and households.
